gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. Now I want to train a large language model for code comment generation tasks specifically focused on Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

Name of the module and its functionality is as follows:

Correct Verilog RTL codes use plain English words representing design constructs, and operators. It would be helpful if you could provide a correct, readable Verilog RTL code snippet so that we can process and comprehend it.

Input and output ports and their explanation is as follows: 
Apologies for the confusion, but without meaningful and properly formatted Verilog code, I cannot answer the above questions. The given code contains non-decipherable characters and does not adhere to standard Verilog syntax. Please provide readable Verilog RTL code snippet to process it and answer your questions.

Internal signals and their explanation is as follows: 
I'm sorry for the confusion, but the provided code isn't readable Verilog RTL, so I can't answer the questions about internal signals in the module. The code presented consists of non-decipherable characters and is not recognizable as a standard Verilog module. For further assistance, please provide a correct and readable Verilog RTL code snippet. This will allow us to identify the internal signals used in the module and understand their roles.
